heading: This Afternoon
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Snow showers likely, and maybe a squall, except slight chance southeast; a trace to 2 inches. Highs from the upper 20s to mid 30s, mid to upper 30s southeast. Southwest winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Variable clouds. Scattered snow showers, mainly between Route 4 and the international border. Lows in the low to mid teens. Southwest winds gusting to 30 mph early, then diminishing and becoming west.

heading: Friday
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers and squalls north, isolated south; a trace to 2 inches. Highs from the upper teens to mid 20s in the south, and mid teens to around 20 north, except low to mid teens in the Adirondacks and near the international border; temperatures falling in northern areas by mid afternoon. Southwest winds 5 to 15 mph and gusting to 30 mph, becoming northwest.
